eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Marshall, AL; AT 11:33 AM ON OCT 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:48 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Marshall County Emergency Management Agency alerting system. **THIS IS ONLY A TEST** Should this have been a real emergency then instructions would follow.
